name: Lombardy Energy Cleantech Cluster
goal: Lombardy Energy Cleantech Cluster (LE2C) is a nonprofit organization composed by 140 members (large and SMEs companies, universities and research centers, industrial associations and nonprofit bodies, institutions from the public sector and financial institutions). The MISSION of the Lombardy Energy Cleantech Cluster is to foster the Cleantech and energy sector, and to create synergies among its members in order to improve innovation and competitiveness. LE2C supports the internationalization of its companies and technology transferred, especially for SMEs, facilitating access to European funding, organizing b2b and trade business missions. LE2C stimulate networking at regional, national and International level. LE2C collaborate with International Cleantech Network (ICN), is a profiled member of ECCP (European Cluster Collaboration Platform) and GCCA (Global Cleantech Cluster Association). In 2015 it was awarded with the GOLD LABEL excellence certification, becoming the First Cluster in Italy with such a recognition.
euInitiatives:
•Horizon 2020 / Horizon Europe
•European Territorial Cooperation (ETC) programmes (i.e. Interreg Europe)
•Smart Specialisation Strategy (S3) Thematic Platforms
